#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define lli long long int
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define si(a) scanf("%d",&a);
#define slli(a) scanf("%lld",&a);
#define INF 1000000007
#define MAX 100005
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define sn struct node
int main()
{
	lli i,j,k,m,n,t,d,a,flag,tmp;
	slli(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		slli(n);
		slli(k);
		flag=0;

		f(d,1,3)
		{
			tmp=k-(n*(n-1)*d)/2;
			if(tmp>0 && tmp%n==0)
				flag=1;
		}
		if(flag)
			cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
}
